nodes.text: The Visitor's Hotel was a hotel in Ahto City during the Jedi Civil War, located near the Republic Embassy. It was run by Ignus. Gluupor the Rodian and Firith Me, an infamous pazaak player, were longstanding residents.

Sunry and Elassa Huros used it for the location of their affair, and it was also the scene of Elassa's murder. When the memory-wiped Revan was appointed Arbiter in Sunry's trial for the murder, he went there to examine the hotel and question the witnesses. He eventually discovered that Sunry was guilty.
